animal.question: I quack and waddle, and love to swim in a lake. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm often yellow when I'm young.
💧 I like to play in puddles.
🍞 People sometimes feed me bread.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and purr, and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk.
😴 I like to take naps in sunny spots.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 My nose can pick things up.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots all over. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves from tall trees.
🦒 I'm the tallest mammal on Earth.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and graze on the African plains. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are like a unique fingerprint.
🐎 I look a little like a horse.
🌍 I live in grasslands.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia.
🦵 I have very strong legs.
🌱 I eat plants.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 Some of us are poisonous.
🥚 I hatch from eggs.
🐭 I like to eat rodents.

animal.question: I have eight legs and spin a web. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I catch food in my web.
🕷️ Some people are afraid of me.
🐛 I eat insects.

animal.question: I am a big cat with a mane. I am known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a loud roar.
🥩 I eat meat.
👑 I live in Africa and India

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms and a beak. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color.
🌊 I squirt ink when I'm scared.
🧠 I am very smart.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold, and fun to play in. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I’m made of tiny crystals of ice.
⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves to play with me.

weather.question: I am a big, bright ball in the sky. I give you light and keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 Plants need me to grow.
🕶️ You might need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I am very, very hot.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make everything wet. You might need an umbrella when I appear. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Puddles form when I fall.
☔ I can help flowers grow.
🌧️ I am water falling from the clouds.

weather.question: I am white and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain, and sometimes I block the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy sheep.
🌫️ I am made of tiny water droplets.
🌥️ Sometimes I am dark and grey.

weather.question: I am strong and can move trees. I can be gentle or very wild. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves swirl around.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I am moving air.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky, formed when the sun shines after rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have seven colors.
☀️ I need sunshine and rain to appear.
🌉 I look like a bridge in the sky.

weather.question: I rumble and crash, and sometimes light up the sky. I often come with heavy rain. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a sudden spark of electricity.
⛈️ You might hear me during a storm.
☁️ I can be dangerous.

weather.question: I am small balls of ice that fall from the sky. I can damage cars and plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen rain.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you.
🌪️ I form in thunderstorms.

weather.question: I am a swirling storm over the ocean, with very strong winds and heavy rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🚩 People prepare for me by boarding up windows.
🌊 I can cause a lot of damage to coastal areas.

weather.question: I am a dry and hot period, where there is very little rain for a long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ Plants and animals can struggle to survive during me.
🔥 Sometimes wildfires start because of me.
🌵 Farmers worry about me for their crops.
